Class ClientCredsTokenProvider

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientCredsTokenProvider

        public ClientCredsTokenProvider​(java.lang.String authEndpoint,
                                java.lang.String clientId,
                                java.lang.String clientSecret)
        constructs a token provider based on supplied credentials.
        Parameters:
        authEndpoint - the OAuth 2.0 token endpoint associated with the user's directory (obtain from Active Directory configuration)
        clientId - the client ID (GUID) of the client web app obtained from Azure Active Directory configuration
        clientSecret - the secret key of the client web app

    • Method Detail

      • refreshToken

        protected AzureADToken refreshToken​()
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from class: AccessTokenProvider
        the method to fetch the access token. Derived classes should override this method to actually get the token from Azure Active Directory.

        This method will be called initially, and then once when the token is about to expire.

        Specified by:
        refreshToken in class AccessTokenProvider
        Returns:
        AzureADToken containing the access token
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error fetching the token
